dt: {bc}to undergo a new beginning {bc}start or {d_link|commence|commence} again

dt.t: The search {wi}recommenced{/wi} early the next morning in more favorable weather conditions with gentle winds and no waves.
The marshal had to review the design plans and make sure it was up to code before construction could {wi}recommence{/wi}.

The gunner in the other jeep spun his weapon 180 degrees and {wi}recommenced{/wi} firing, the tracers reaching out to the clump of large dead trees the convoy commander had mentioned as the probable site of the enemy fire.
As soon as she supposed me absorbed in my occupation she {wi}recommenced{/wi} her silent weeping …

shortdef: to undergo a new beginning : start or commence again
to cause (something) to begin again : renew
